General.Name: Calida Holding AG
General.Description: CALIDA Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in apparel business in France, Germany, Switzerland, other Europe, Asia, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: CALIDA, AUBADE, and LAFUMA MOBILIER. It offers underwear and luxury lingerie under CALIDA, AUBADE, ERLICH TEXTIL, COSABELLA, and LAFUMA MOBILIER brand names. It also offers outdoor furniture under LAFUMA MOBILIER brand. The company sells its products through e-shops. The company was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Sursee, Switzerland.
